Key Match Events: Craig Kimbrel gave up Ketel Marte's walk-off single in the bottom of the ninth in Game 3.
Kimbrel allowed a game-tying two-run homer to Alek Thomas in the bottom of the eighth in Game 4.
Gabriel Moreno's single off José Alvarado drove in the go-ahead run in Game 4.
Bryce Harper had a chance to give the Phillies a lead with two runners on in the bottom of the seventh but flied out to center field.
Post-Match Reflections: Bryce Harper expressed optimism that the future is still bright for the Phillies despite the loss.
Harper mentioned that the Phillies have a great owner and that Dave Dombrowski will provide the best opportunity to win.
Harper acknowledged that the Phillies won't be shy about spending to upgrade their roster.
